ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Any news about Tinkering Patch
ygData.msgSnippet: gotta love verant...now i gotta decide if i should spend the 12k i got saved, and practice now, or wait and see it tinkering gets cheaper when they fix it :(
ygData.messageBody:
gotta love verant...now i gotta decide if i should spend the 12k i got
saved, and practice now, or wait and see it tinkering gets cheaper when they
'fix' it :(

-x-

> > Subject says it all. They said that tinkering would go in after the
>Hole and
> > poison changes and Hole is in and I saw some mention of poison coming
>soon.
> > Anyone know any eta?
>
>"After poisoning" is all that Abashi said. There was nothing definite.
>I'm
>not holding my breath.
>
>Pasketti, Pover
